Atmospheric Model Intercomparison Project (AMIP) bụ usoro nnwale màkà ụdị mgbasa ikuku zuru ụwa ọnụ (AGCMs)
Ọ na-enye akụrụngwa dabeere na obodo iji kwado nchọpụta ụdị ihu igwe, nkwenye, intercomparison, akwụkwọ na ịnweta data
Ihe fọrọ nkè nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị mba ụwa niile na-eme ihe ngosi ihu igwe etinyela aka na ọrụ a kemgbe e malitere ya n'afọ 1990.

AMIP na-akwado site na Working Group on Numerical Experimentation (WGNE) nkè World Climate Research Programme, ma na-achịkwa ya site na Program for Climate Model Diagnosis and Intercomparison na nduzi nkè WGNE AMIP Panel.
Nnyocha AMIP n'onwe ya dị mfe site na imewe; AGCM na-egbochi okpomọkụ dị n'elu oké osimiri na ice oké osimiri site n'afo 1979 ruo nso ugbu a, yana usoro zuru oke nkè ubi echekwara màkà nyocha nyocha.
Nhazi ihe nlereanya a na-ewepụ mgbagwoju anya nkè oke osimiri na ikuku na usoro ihu igwe
Ebumnuche ya abụghị ka ejiri ya mee ihe màkà amụma mgbanwe ihu igwe, mgbalị nké chọrọ ihe nlereanya ikuku na oké osimiri (dịka, lee ọrụ nwanne nwanyị AMIP CMIP).
